languages.text: "Хейнрикс наверняка мог бы что-то рассказать вам о нашем узилище... но его судьба нам до сих пор неизвестна".

traits.locale_text: "Хейнрикс наверняка мог бы что-то рассказать вам о нашем узилище... но его судьба нам до сих пор неизвестна".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Van Calox could probably tell you something about our prison... but his fate is as yet unknown."
languages.original_text: "Хейнрикс наверняка мог бы что-то рассказать вам о нашем узилище... но его судьба нам до сих пор неизвестна".

traits.locale_text: "Van Calox could probably tell you something about our prison... but his fate is as yet unknown."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Van Calox could probably tell you something about our prison... but his fate is as yet unknown."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Van Calox could probably tell you something about our prison... but his fate is as yet unknown."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Van Calox could probably tell you something about our prison... but his fate is as yet unknown."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “或许冯·卡洛克斯可以告诉您关于这座监狱的情况……但我们并不清楚他目前境况如何。”
languages.original_text: "Van Calox could probably tell you something about our prison... but his fate is as yet unknown."

traits.locale_text: “或许冯·卡洛克斯可以告诉您关于这座监狱的情况……但我们并不清楚他目前境况如何。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Van Calox could probably tell you something about our prison... but his fate is as yet unknown."

languages.text: «Van Calox probablemente pueda decirle algo sobre nuestra prisión... pero no sabemos qué ha sido de él».
languages.original_text: "Van Calox could probably tell you something about our prison... but his fate is as yet unknown."

traits.locale_text: «Van Calox probablemente pueda decirle algo sobre nuestra prisión... pero no sabemos qué ha sido de él».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ヴァン・カロックスなら、我らの牢獄について何かを教えてくれるでしょうが…彼の命運はまだわかっていません」
languages.original_text: "Van Calox could probably tell you something about our prison... but his fate is as yet unknown."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴァン・カロックスなら、我らの牢獄について何かを教えてくれるでしょうが…彼の命運はまだわかっていません」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Van Calox könnte Euch vermutlich etwas über unser Gefängnis sagen ... doch wir wissen noch immer nicht, was aus ihm geworden ist."
languages.original_text: "Van Calox could probably tell you something about our prison... but his fate is as yet unknown."

traits.locale_text: "Van Calox könnte Euch vermutlich etwas über unser Gefängnis sagen ... doch wir wissen noch immer nicht, was aus ihm geworden ist."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Van Calox pourrait certainement vous donner des informations sur notre prison... mais nous ignorons ce qu'il est advenu de lui. »
languages.original_text: "Van Calox could probably tell you something about our prison... but his fate is as yet unknown."

traits.locale_text: « Van Calox pourrait certainement vous donner des informations sur notre prison... mais nous ignorons ce qu'il est advenu de lui. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Van Calox, mahkûm tutulduğumuz zindanlarla ilgili bir şeyler biliyor olmalı... Gerçi onun akıbeti de belirsiz."
languages.original_text: "Van Calox could probably tell you something about our prison... but his fate is as yet unknown."

traits.locale_text: "Van Calox, mahkûm tutulduğumuz zindanlarla ilgili bir şeyler biliyor olmalı... Gerçi onun akıbeti de belirsiz."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
